name: Google Takeout
notes: Comprehensive export tool for most Google services. You choose which products to include.

name: Facebook
notes: Download Your Information tool. Includes posts, photos, comments, and activity logs.

name: Twitter (X)
notes: Archive includes tweets, direct messages, media, and more. Might take a few hours to generate.

name: Instagram
notes: Request your data through settings or the app. Photos and videos will be in a separate folder.

name: LinkedIn
notes: Multiple data archives available: connections, messages, job applications, account activity.

name: GitHub
notes: Account data and repository exports are separate processes. Repository cloning is via Git.

name: Spotify
notes: Under 'Download your data' in privacy settings. Can take up to 30 days due to data volume.

name: Reddit
notes: Your personal data file includes posts, comments, and messages. Generated periodically.

name: Netflix
notes: Download your viewing history and interaction data. Link is usually within privacy settings.

name: Twitch
notes: Request data download from privacy settings. May take several days for large archives.

name: Discord
notes: Request your data through User Settings > Privacy & Safety. Includes messages, attachments, etc.

name: Microsoft Account
notes: Manage and download data across various Microsoft services like Outlook, Xbox, and activity history.
